description:
Spring is the new way to go shopping on your phone... and it just got even easier.

We are now offering Apple Pay so shopping on Spring from your iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus is as simple as a touch of a finger with Touch ID.

Shop new arrivals every day from our curated community of brands that includes luxury labels, emerging designers, fast-fashion, beauty and lifestyle - all in one app, all in one touch. 

You’ll find just-on-Spring exclusives, secret sample sales, one-of-a-kinds, best sellers and collections curated by top influencers and editors. 

How does Spring work? 

- Follow brands to personalize your shopping experience. 
- And when you find something you love, enjoy seamless checkout with ApplePay or our Spring swipe. (You only type in your shipping and billing information once so it’s fast and easy to purchase!)

Other awesome features you should know about: 

- Love any product to save for later. 
- Share with a single tap. 
- Explore collections curated by top influencers and editors.

And we’re not the only ones who #lovespring:

"Shopping made simple. So MAJOR. Loving Spring."
- Rachel Zoe, Stylist and Designer

"I've been waiting for an app like Spring for what feels like eons — all my favorite designers in one place, and all shoppable, with a totally elegant interface".
- Eva Chen, Editor-in-Chief, Lucky Magazine

"Let's be honest, Spring is dangerous. The bright side? Your closet is about to get that much better."
- Hillary Kerr, Co-Founder, WhoWhatWear.com

Welcome to Spring. All year long.
